'Elimination' is a four-player version of [[Pong]] by Atari Inc. subsidiary Kee
Games, and designed by Steve Bristow. It was later released as 'Quadrapong'
under the Atari label. {{cite web
  | last = Vendel first = Curt title = ATARI Coin-Op/Arcade Systems 1970 - 1974
  | url=http://www.atarimuseum.com/videogames/arcade/arcade70.html accessdate =
  | 2007-07-16 }}
